title: Chicken Biryani
description: A popular South Asian mixed rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and marinated chicken
steps: Marinate 500 grams of chicken pieces in a mixture of 1 cup yogurt, 2 tablespoons ginger paste, 2 tablespoons garlic paste, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 teaspoon red chili powder, salt, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice for at least 30 minutes
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add 1 large onion, thinly sliced, and cook until golden brown
Add 2 cloves of garlic, minced, and 1 teaspoon of ginger paste, and sauté for 1 minute
Add the marinated chicken and cook until the chicken is cooked through

In a separate pan, heat 2 cups of basmati rice with 4 cups of water, 1 tablespoon ghee or oil, and salt to taste. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer until the rice is 70% cooked
Layer the cooked chicken, rice, and fried onions in a large pot or Dutch oven. Add 1/4 cup of chopped fresh mint leaves and 1/4 cup of chopped fresh cilantro
Cover the pot and cook over low heat for 10–15 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together
Serve the Biryani hot, garnished with additional mint leaves and cilantro if desired
